words.definition: Used as a greeting or to begin a phone conversation.
examples: Hello, how are you?
Hello, this is John speaking.

words.definition: The earth, together with all of its countries, peoples, and natural features.
examples: The world is a beautiful place.
People from all over the world came to the event.

words.definition: An electronic device for processing and storing data.
examples: I use my computer to work from home.
The computer crashed and I lost all my files.

words.definition: Pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically.
examples: She is a beautiful person inside and out.
The sunset was absolutely beautiful.

words.definition: Facts, information, and skills acquired through experience or education.
examples: Knowledge is power.
He has extensive knowledge of ancient history.
